query.statement:
SELECT * FROM ( SELECT '0' AS CHK, /* 체크 */ '0' AS FLAG, /* 입력,수정,삭제 플래그 상태: I, U, D */ CS111A.ARA, /* 지역코드 */ VALUE(SAPHEE.CODE_CONV(CS111A.MANDT,'CS115',CS111A.ARA),'') ARA_NM, /* 지역명 */ B010.VKGRP AS TEM, /* 팀코드 */ VALUE(SAPHEE.CODE_CONV(CS111A.MANDT,'VKGRP',B010.VKGRP),'') TEM_NM, /* 팀명 */ CS111A.BPM, /* 보수PM */ VALUE(SAPHEE.GET_BOSU_INWON(CS111A.MANDT,CS111A.BPM),'') BPM_NM, /* 보수PM명 */ CS111A.BSU, /* 보수협력사 */ VALUE(SAPHEE.GET_VENDER_N_NAME(CS111A.MANDT,CS111A.BSU),'') BSU_NM, /* 보수협력사명 */ MASTER01A.ZSITE_NM ZSITE_NM, /* 현장명 */ MASTER01A.KUNNR, /* 고객코드 */ MASTER01A.KUNNR_NM KUNNR_NM, /* 고객명 */ (SELECT TELF1 FROM SAPHEE.KNA1 WHERE MANDT = MASTER01A.MANDT AND KUNNR = MASTER01A.KUNNR ) AS TELF1, /* 고객연락처 */ CS101A.CS101_PJT PJT, /* 프로잭트 */ CS101A.CS101_PJT||CS101A.CS101_HNO AS PJTHNO, /* 프로잭트+호기번호 */ CS101A.CS101_HNO HNO, /* 호기 */ CS101A.CS101_HNA HNA, /* 호기명 */ CS101A.CS101_FDT ISD, /* 보수인수승인일자 */ MASTER02A.ZMUSAOCNT, /* 무상공사예산개월수 */ MASTER02A.ZMUSAUCNT, /* 무상공사사용개월수 */ MASTER02A.ZMUSAOCNT2, /* 무상일반예산개월수 */ MASTER02A.ZMUSAUCNT2, /* 무상일반사용개월수 */ VALUE(VB.MB_STN,'') AS MB_STN, /* 무상보수개시기준 */ CASE VALUE(VB.MB_STN,'') WHEN '1' THEN '완성검사시' WHEN '2' THEN '입주시' WHEN '3' THEN '건물준공시' WHEN '4' THEN '고객인도시' ELSE '' END MB_STN_NAME, /* 무상보수개시기준 */ (SELECT ORT01 FROM SAPHEE.LFA1 A, SAPHEE.ZWBT010 B WHERE A.LAND1 = 'KR' AND A.MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND A.LIFNR = B.LIFNR AND A.MANDT = B.MANDT AND B.LGORT = CS111A.BSU ) AS B_VNDADR, /* 업체주소 */ (SELECT NAME1 FROM SAPHEE.LFA1 A, SAPHEE.ZWBT010 B WHERE A.LAND1 = 'KR' AND A.MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND A.LIFNR = B.LIFNR AND A.MANDT = B.MANDT AND B.LGORT = CS111A.BSU ) AS B_VNDNM, /* 업체명 */ (SELECT J_1KFREPRE FROM SAPHEE.LFA1 A, SAPHEE.ZWBT010 B WHERE A.LAND1 = 'KR' AND A.MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND A.LIFNR = B.LIFNR AND A.MANDT = B.MANDT AND B.LGORT = CS111A.BSU ) AS B_REPNM, /* 대표자 */ CASE WHEN SUBSTR(MASTER02A.POSID_1,7,1) = 'G' THEN MASTER02A.ZSPEC10 WHEN SUBSTR(MASTER02A.POSID_1,7,1) = 'J' THEN MASTER02A.ZSPEC9 ELSE '0' END ZSPEC, /* 발주요청자 */ MASTER02A.ZSPEC1 TYP, /* 기종 */ MASTER02A.ZSPEC2 ZSPEC2, /* 사양 */ CS111A.GBU, /* 직영/협력사구분 */ CS111A.ABG, /* 빌딩구분 */ CS111A.AGB, /* 시내외구분 */ '' as SEQ, /* 등록시퀀스 */ '' AS BGT, /* 발주개시일자 */ '' AS BHD, /* 발주해지일자 */ '' AS CBS, /* 최초발주개시일자 */ '' AS JUC, /* 주택관리업체 */ CASE WHEN DECODE(MASTER02A.ZSPEC3, '' , 0, MASTER02A.ZSPEC3) >= INT(MM028E.CTEXT2) THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END AS HTY, /* 고속기종여부(150보다클때 고속) */ '' AS HYN, /* 입주확인서여부 - 필요없다고 함 by 최인식과장 */ '' AS DNO, /* 전자결재문서번호 */ '' AS ADD, /* 추가발주일자 */ CS111A.IJD AS IJD, /* 입주일자 */ CS101A.CS101_FDT AS FDT, /* 보수인수승인일자 */ CS111A.AYS, /* 무상공사-최초발주일 */ CS111A.BYS, /* 무상일반-최초발주일 */ MASTER02A.POSID_1 || '-R' AS GNO, /* WBS */
'N' AS ADD_YN, /* 추가발주여부 */ (INT(MASTER02A.ZMUSAOCNT)-INT(MASTER02A.ZMUSAUCNT)) AS MG1, /* 발주개월수 */ (INT(MASTER02A.ZMUSAOCNT)-INT(MASTER02A.ZMUSAUCNT)) AS MON, /* 발주개월수 */ 'A' AS GND, '무상공사' AS GND_NM, '' AS BGT_A, '' AS BMT_A, '' AS BGT_B, '' AS BMT_B
'N' AS ADD_YN, /* 추가발주여부 */ (INT(MASTER02A.ZMUSAOCNT2)-INT(MASTER02A.ZMUSAUCNT2)) AS MG1, /* 발주개월수 */ (INT(MASTER02A.ZMUSAOCNT2)-INT(MASTER02A.ZMUSAUCNT2)) AS MON, /* 발주개월수 */ 'B' AS GND, '무상일반' AS GND_NM, VALUE((SELECT (CS116_BGT) FROM SAPHEE.ZCST116 WHERE MANDT=CS101A.MANDT AND CS116_PJT=CS101A.CS101_PJT AND CS116_HNO=CS101A.CS101_HNO AND CS116_GND='A' ORDER BY (MANDT||CS116_PJT||CS116_HNO||CS116_SEQ) DESC FETCH FIRST 1 ROW ONLY),'') AS BGT_A, (SELECT (CS116_BMT) FROM SAPHEE.ZCST116 WHERE MANDT=CS101A.MANDT AND CS116_PJT=CS101A.CS101_PJT AND CS116_HNO=CS101A.CS101_HNO AND CS116_GND='A' ORDER BY (MANDT||CS116_PJT||CS116_HNO||CS116_SEQ) DESC FETCH FIRST 1 ROW ONLY) AS BMT_A, '' AS BGT_B, '' AS BMT_B
FROM SAPHEE.ZCST101 CS101A LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT MANDT, CS172_PJO, CS172_HNO, MAX(CS172_MDT) MDT FROM SAPHEE.ZCST172 /* 교체 및 회수 프로젝트 관리 */ WHERE MANDT = #G_MANDT# GROUP BY MANDT, CS172_PJO, CS172_HNO ) CS172A ON CS101A.MANDT = CS172A.MANDT AND CS101A.CS101_PJT = CS172A.CS172_PJO AND CS101A.CS101_HNO = CS172A.CS172_HNO LEFT OUTER JOIN SAPHEE.VBAK VB ON CS101A.MANDT = VB.MANDT AND CS101A.CS101_PJT = VB.ZZPJT_ID, SAPHEE.ZCST111 CS111A, SAPHEE.ZMASTER01 MASTER01A, SAPHEE.ZMASTER02 MASTER02A, SAPHEE.ZWBT010 B010, SAPHEE.ZLCODE MM028E WHERE CS101A.MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND CS101A.CS101_PST = 'A6' AND CS101A.CS101_ARA > '' AND CS101A.CS101_BSU > '' AND CS101A.CS101_PJT NOT LIKE 'M%' -- 인수일자 추가
AND CS101A.CS101_FDT = #ISD#
AND VALUE(CS101A.CS101_FDT,'') <> '' AND CS111A.MANDT = CS101A.MANDT AND CS111A.PJT = CS101A.CS101_PJT AND CS111A.HNO = CS101A.CS101_HNO AND ( CS111A.HST <> 'D' OR ( CS111A.HST = 'D' AND VALUE(CS172A.CS172_PJO,'') > '' ) ) AND CS111A.MANDT = MASTER01A.MANDT AND CS111A.PJT = MASTER01A.POSID AND CS111A.MANDT = MASTER02A.MANDT AND CS111A.PJT = MASTER02A.POSID AND CS111A.PJT||CS111A.HNO = MASTER02A.POSID_1 AND CS111A.MANDT = #G_MANDT# --AND CS101A.CS101_LOC <> '' --AND CS101A.CS101_CIN <> '' --AND CS101A.CS101_HNA <> '' --AND (CS111A.JUJ <> '' OR CS111A.BUJ <> '') AND CS111A.MANDT = B010.MANDT AND CS111A.BSU = B010.LGORT AND B010.LGORT > '' AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM SAPHEE.ZCST144 A, SAPHEE.ZCST143 B WHERE A.MANDT = B.MANDT AND A.CS144_SEQ = B.CS143_SEQ AND A.MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND A.CS144_PST = 'A6' AND A.MANDT = CS101A.MANDT AND A.CS144_PJT = CS101A.CS101_PJT AND A.CS144_HNO = CS101A.CS101_HNO ) /* 실패등록된 호기가 아닐때 */ -- 유상계약이 없을때 --AND ( SELECT VALUE(MAX(CASE WHEN CS126_HNO > '' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END), 0) -- FROM SAPHEE.ZCST126 -- WHERE MANDT = CS101A.MANDT -- AND CS126_PJT = CS101A.CS101_PJT -- AND CS126_HNO = CS101A.CS101_HNO -- AND CS126_PST = 'A6' -- AND CS126_DDT = '' -- AND (VALUE(CS126_USD,'') > #DAT# OR VALUE(CS126_USD,'') = '') ) = 0 -- 문제점현황에 없을때 --AND EXISTS ( SELECT COUNT(1) -- FROM SAPHEE.ZCST108 CS108A -- WHERE MANDT = CS101A.MANDT -- AND CS108_PJT = CS101A.CS101_PJT -- AND CS108_HNO = CS101A.CS101_HNO -- GROUP BY CS108A.MANDT, CS108A.CS108_PJT, CS108A.CS108_HNO ) AND MASTER02A.MANDT = MM028E.MANDT AND MM028E.CODE1 = 'CS120' AND MM028E.CODE2 = 'B4' AND MM028E.LANG = #G_LANG# AND CS101A.CS101_PJT = #PJT# AND SUBSTR(CS101A.CS101_HNO,1,1) = #HNO_GB#
AND NOT EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM SAPHEE.ZCST116 WHERE MANDT = CS101A.MANDT AND CS116_PJT = CS101A.CS101_PJT AND CS116_HNO = CS101A.CS101_HNO ) AND INT(MASTER02A.ZMUSAOCNT) > 0 AND INT(MASTER02A.ZMUSAUCNT) >= 0 -- AND INT(MASTER02A.ZMUSAOCNT2) > 0 AND INT(MASTER02A.ZMUSAUCNT2) = 0 AND (INT(MASTER02A.ZMUSAOCNT) - INT(MASTER02A.ZMUSAUCNT)) > 0
AND NOT EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM SAPHEE.ZCST116 WHERE MANDT = CS101A.MANDT AND CS116_PJT = CS101A.CS101_PJT AND CS116_HNO = CS101A.CS101_HNO AND CS116_GND = 'B' ) AND ( ( INT(MASTER02A.ZMUSAOCNT) > 0 AND INT(MASTER02A.ZMUSAUCNT) > 0 ) OR (INT(MASTER02A.ZMUSAOCNT) = 0 AND INT(MASTER02A.ZMUSAUCNT) = 0 ) ) AND INT(MASTER02A.ZMUSAOCNT2) > 0 AND INT(MASTER02A.ZMUSAUCNT2) >= 0 AND (INT(MASTER02A.ZMUSAOCNT2) - INT(MASTER02A.ZMUSAUCNT2)) > 0
) WHERE 1 = 1 AND ADD_YN = #GBN# ORDER BY PJT, FDT, HNO FOR FETCH ONLY WITH UR
